comments.body: reverse the order here, "used in dark themes and on darkly-colored..."

lightly-colored.

But "light" is probably sufficient. In particular, "lightly-colored" means "has a little bit of color" which probably isn't what we mean here.

rename _black and _white as well.

Maybe blackMountainView and blackCupertino etc.
i'm curious, when does this end up getting called?
I'm not sure it gets called in production, but conceptually it should be there.
